name: Coffee Pixes
description: Coffee Pixes is a relaxing puzzle game in which you place 'Pixes' on to the board in a row to clear them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 (Service Pack 1 or above) Processor: Intel compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel compatible Quad Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 based graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Sound Blaster or similar
